div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:35 am CDT

div.div: A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly between 10am and 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. Breezy, with a southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly after 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. South wind 10 to 15 mph.
A 40 percent chance of showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 61. East southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northeast in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 15 mph.
